author: USA TODAY, Arlene Martinez, USA TODAY
title: In California: Most agencies aren't tracking race, ethnicity of coronavirus patients
description: Are Latinos, African Americans and Asians dying at higher rates from the coronavirus? The data's pretty limited. And Quibi's here, ready to find out just how many streaming services we'll pay for. Plus: I talk to a senior in San Diego who will probably be spe…
content:
It's Arlene Martínez with news for Wednesday. 
But first, he never really liked that device to help with his sleep apnea. So he and others in the Bay Area got busy converting them to use as ventilators to help COVID-19 patients breathe. 
In California bring… [+10766 chars]
